themes: Perceived exclusivity based on identity criteria
key_phrases: programs are only for certain under represented groups
if you don’t meet certain requirements of race, gender, sexuality, then you will likely not be considered
breed inauthentic programming from groups who are just trying to seek funding
missing out on incredible art from all people
